title: [Chinese Language][Music Video] Cold Blooded Animal - The Place
description:
[Chinese Language][Music Video] Cold Blooded Animal - The Place Where Buried Treasure Lies.mpg
----------------------------------------------------------------------

  brought to you by DaoBan

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Content:

Mainland China Rock n Roll.

IMHO, Cold Blooded Animal is the best Chinese rock band happening.  I really like these guys.

Pinyin Song Title is:  mai cang zhe bao zang de di fang
English Song Title is:  The Place Where Buried Treasure Lies

Song is available on their self-titled debut album from 2000.

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Notes on the files:

-Nothing fancy:  VCD -> ISObuster -> .mpg

Also included:
- .jpg of the cover of the VCD
